And the options I'm given are: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/3wuig.jpg[/img]

item.title: Small Error using Eclipse IDE (718)
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:10, topic:464457”]It says the problem right there. Instead of guessing what it could be based on the error, read the error, as it will give you only one cause.

opcode is not defined in the scope in which it is used, or “opcode cannot be resolved to a variable” which means that there is no “opcode” variable defined.[/quote]

And how would I fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Small Error using Eclipse IDE (718)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

It says the problem right there. Instead of guessing what it could be based on the error, read the error, as it will give you only one cause.

opcode is not defined in the scope in which it is used, or “opcode cannot be resolved to a variable” which means that there is no “opcode” variable defined.

Read full topic

item.title: Small Error using Eclipse IDE (718)
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

MrFun:

Is this a 100 error? if so it looks like you accidentally deleted something or you forgot to add something

Yeah it’s 100 errors. I’m not sure if I’m forgetting something or not, I’ve looked the code over multiple times and haven’t noticed anything extraordinary. I’ll post the code below if you want to take a look.

private final void method1681(BufferedStream buffer) { } boolean bool (opcode == 1) { modelId = buffer.readBigSmart(); if (opcode == 2) name = buffer.readString(); else if (opcode == 4) modelZoom = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 5) modelRotation1 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 6) modelRotation2 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 7) modelOffset1 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); if (modelOffset1 > 32767) modelOffset1 -= 65536; modelOffset1 <<= 0; if (opcode == 8) { modelOffset2 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); if (modelOffset2 > 32767) modelOffset2 -= 65536; modelOffset2 <<= 0; } else if (opcode == 11) stackable = 1; else if (opcode == 12) value = buffer.readInt(); else if (opcode == 13) { equipSlot = stream.readUnsignedByte(); } else if (opcode == 14) { equipType = stream.readUnsignedByte(); } else if (opcode == 16) membersOnly = true; else if (opcode == 18) buffer.readUnsignedShortLE(); else if (opcode == 23) maleEquip1 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 24) maleEquip2 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 25) femaleEquip1 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 26) femaleEquip2 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 27) buffer.readUnsignedByte(); else if (opcode >= 30 && opcode < 35) groundOptions[opcode - 30] = buffer.readString(); else if (opcode >= 35 && opcode < 40) inventoryOptions[opcode - 35] = buffer.readString(); else if (opcode == 40) { int length = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); originalModelColors = new int[length]; modifiedModelColors = new int[length]; for (int index = 0; index < length; index++) { originalModelColors[index] = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); modifiedModelColors[index] = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } } else if (opcode == 41) { int length = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); originalTextureColors = new short[length]; modifiedTextureColors = new short[length]; for (int index = 0; index < length; index++) { originalTextureColors[index] = (short) buffer .readUnsignedShort(); modifiedTextureColors[index] = (short) buffer .readUnsignedShort(); } } else if (opcode == 42) { int length = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownArray1 = new byte[length]; for (int index = 0; index < length; index++) unknownArray1[index] = (byte) buffer.readByte(); } else if (opcode == 65) unnoted = true; else if (opcode == 78) maleEquipModelId3 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 79) femaleEquipModelId3 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 90) unknownInt1 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 91) unknownInt2 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 92) unknownInt3 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 93) unknownInt4 = buffer.readBigSmart(); else if (opcode == 95) unknownInt5 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 96) unknownInt6 = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); else if (opcode == 97) certId = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 98) certTemplateId = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode >= 100 && opcode < 110) { if (stackIds == null) { stackIds = new int[10]; stackAmounts = new int[10]; } stackIds[opcode - 100] = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); stackAmounts[opcode - 100] = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 110) unknownInt7 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 111) unknownInt8 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 112) unknownInt9 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 113) unknownInt10 = buffer.readByte(); else if (opcode == 114) unknownInt11 = buffer.readByte() * 5; else if (opcode == 115) teamId = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); else if (opcode == 121) lendId = stream.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 122) lendTemplateId = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 125) { unknownInt12 = buffer.readByte() << 0; unknownInt13 = buffer.readByte() << 0; unknownInt14 = buffer.readByte() << 0; } else if (opcode == 126) { unknownInt15 = buffer.readByte() << 0; unknownInt16 = buffer.readByte() << 0; unknownInt17 = buffer.readByte() << 0; } else if (opcode == 127) { unknownInt18 = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownInt19 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 128) { unknownInt20 = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownInt21 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 129) { unknownInt20 = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownInt21 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 130) { unknownInt22 = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownInt23 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 132) { int length = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); unknownArray2 = new int[length]; for (int index = 0; index < length; index++) unknownArray2[index] = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 134) { int unknownValue = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); } else if (opcode == 139) { unknownValue2 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 140) { unknownValue1 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); } else if (opcode == 249) { int length = buffer.readUnsignedByte(); if (clientScriptData == null) clientScriptData = new HashMap<Integer, Object>(length); for (int index = 0; index < length; index++) { boolean stringInstance = buffer.readUnsignedByte() == 1; int key = stream.read24BitInt(); Object value = stringInstance ? buffer.readString() : buffer .readInt(); clientScriptData.put(key, value); } } else if (opcode == 44) opcode44 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 55) opcode55 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 62) opcode62 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 144) opcode144 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 118) opcode118 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 46) opcode46 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 56) opcode56 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 47) opcode47 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 83) opcode83 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 146) opcode146 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 87) opcode87 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 99) opcode99 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 17) opcode17 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 117) opcode117 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 9) opcode9 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 142) opcode142 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 145) opcode145 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 150) opcode150 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 151) opcode151 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 152) opcode152 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 153) opcode153 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else if (opcode == 154) opcode154 = buffer.readUnsignedShort(); else throw new RuntimeException("Missing opcode " + opcode + " for item: " + getId()); } // 734 opcodes private int opcode44; private int opcode144; private int opcode145; private int opcode150; private int opcode151; private int opcode152; private int opcode153; private int opcode146; private int opcode142; private int opcode154; private int opcode9; private int opcode117; private int opcode17; private int opcode99; private int opcode87; private int opcode55; private int opcode62; private int opcode118; private int opcode56; private int opcode46; private int opcode47; private int opcode83; private Object itemdefinition_84_;

That’s not the whole ItemDefinitions, but that’s more than the code of what the errors goes to.
